content: number f to determine number of round repeats for sleeves z-4 = g round this number to the nearest number this is your number h for stitch counts you will also use numbers s and t s= c - 2 /2 t= f+1 *2 +4 © 2008 andrea moberly body foundation row using foundation single_crochet see abbreviations/special stitches section make 46 48 52 54 56 c foundation single crochets row 1 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet and in each single_crochet across 46 48 52 54 56 c half_double_crochet row 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next st *bs skip one half_double_crochet double_crochet in next st across working last double_crochet in top of chain 2 of previous row 22 23 25 26 27 s beads and 2 visible double_crochet this is the right side of your work place a stitch marker in the front of one of the bead stitches to mark this as the right side row repeats repeat row 1&2 8 8 9 9 9 10 f times last row repeat row 1 do not finish off sleeves sleeve 1 turn piece clockwise so that hook is on right of short end and right side is facing you bring corners of short end together toward you and join to beginning no-chain single_crochet with a slip_stitch turn piece inside out so that the right side is on the outside and the wrong side is facing you round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and throughout double_crochet in side of half_double_crochet *mod bs in next double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in side of next half_double_crochet repeat from * around 2 double_crochet in side of foundation row join with slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 22 22 24 24 24 26 t double_crochet round 2 chain 3 do not turn double_crochet in top of mod bs from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 *skip 1 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in top of mod bead st from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 repeat from * 5 more times skip 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of last 3 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 19 19 21 21 21 23 t-1 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in top of mod bs from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 *skip 1 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in top of mod bead st from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 repeat from * 5 more times skip 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 17 17 19 19 19 21 t-3 double_crochet round 4 chain 3
